game.name: 魔物召唤森林
game.shortDescription: This is an RPG game made by Rpgmaker, featuring pet catching and equipment grinding. The game storyline lasts approximately 20-30 hours. There are over 30 types of pets, each with a unique aura effect. After the storyline, there is also a meat pigeon tower climbing gameplay, which is rich in content
